fusetools.devops_tools.Local¶

class fusetools.devops_tools.Local[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for dealing with Local DevOps tasks.

Methods

compile_python_pkg

Compiles the Python package.

create_sub_pkg

Creates a package from another package using specified details.

run_handle_cmds

classmethod compile_python_pkg(pkg_dir, pkg_name, pkg_version='0.0.1', os_type='unix', add_docs=False, install_pkg=True)[source]¶

Compiles the Python package.

Parameters

  • pkg_name – Name for package.

  • pkg_dir – Directory of setup.py file for package.

  • install_pkg – Whether or not to install package.

Returns

Command line logs for compilation steps.

classmethod create_sub_pkg(src_pkg_dir, src_pkg_name, tgt_pkg_dir, tgt_pkg_name, folder_list, file_list, module_list=False, install_pkg=True, os_type='unix', pkg_version='0.0.1', python_alias='python3')[source]¶

Creates a package from another package using specified details.

Parameters

  • src_pkg_dir – Directory of source package

  • src_pkg_name – Name of source package

  • tgt_pkg_dir – Directory of target package

  • tgt_pkg_name – Name of target package

  • folder_list – List of file folders to copy from source package directory

  • file_list – List of files to copy from source package directory

  • module_list – List of package modules to copy from source package

  • install_pkg – Whether or not to install the package after copying

  • python_alias – System alias for Python to compile package (ex: python/python3 setup.py sdist)

Returns

Copied package directory
